GK16rnatc__u:2148: indu-nyasta-dṛśo niśamya mukharā kṣemaṃ hasantī kriyāt //
GK16rnatc__u:2151: prekṣya hariṃ vidhir ahasīn mudira-cchanno gabhīro'pi //
GK16rnatc__u:2154: tad dvidhā mukham aṅgaṃ tu tad dvayaṃ pūrvavat tridhā // RNc_263 //
GK16rnatc__u:2158: pratyāsīdati paśya rākṣasa-patiḥ sākṣād ayaṃ pāhi māṃ
GK16rnatc__u:2159: ity utkrośati mugdha-vallava-śiśau smero hariḥ pātu vaḥ //
GK16rnatc__u:2163: yady ullaṅghya giraṃ visarpati tataḥ svāṅge vraṇaṃ pāṇijaiḥ
GK16rnatc__u:2164: kurvann eva kṛtaṃ tvayeti jaratī-laksāya vakṣyāmy aham /
GK16rnatc__u:2165: ity ukte svaram ākulām iva bhayād ālokya rādhāṃ punaḥ
GK16rnatc__u:2166: stabdhībhūta-gatiṃ hariḥ smita-mukhaḥ śliṣyan mudaṃ vaḥ kriyāt //
GK16rnatc__u:2184: rādhā-mādhavayor abhūt kvaṇikaras tasmin navaḥ saṅgamaḥ //
GK16rnatc__u:2194: netur vā nāyikāyā vā vyāpāraḥ svārtha-siddhaye /
GK16rnatc__u:2195: pracchādana-paro yas tu narma-garbhaḥ sa ucyate // RNc_266 //
GK16rnatc__u:2199: samaneṣye dhūrtaṃ tam aham iti jalpan nata-mukhīṃ
GK16rnatc__u:2200: priyāntām āliṅgan harir arati-khedaṃ haratu vaḥ //
GK16rnatc__u:2204: preyaḥ śṛṅgāra-hāsyeṣu proktā vṛttis tu kaiśikī // RNc_268 //
GK16rnatc__u:2206: prāyo raseṣu sarvatra bhāratī karuṇādiṣu // RNc_269 //
